commits.message:
EUCA-12093 - Error creating group after assuming AccountAdministrator role

Description:
 - User is unable to assume the AccountAdministrator role and then use the '--as-account' flag to create a group.

Changes:
 - Revert a change back to something similar to the 4.1.2 behavior in the EuareService::getRealAccount() method.

Testing:
 - Tested assuming the AccountAdministrator role from another account, able to assume the role and use --as-account as expected.
 - Tested assuming the AccountAdministrator role from the eucalyptus account, works as expected.
